profileAlternative.name: Alex Monasterio
profileAlternative.headline: Enterprise improving their clock speed of innovation with MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
Results-Focused and experienced in establishing and leading relationships with key stakeholders and decision-makers on both the business and technical side. Well versed in developing new client relationships while gaining new business opportunities from existing accounts.

positions.title: Director of Strategic Sales
positions.description: Leading a team that is versed in secure cloud solutions that help organizations minimize risk and negative brand impact.

positions.title: Rackspace, the Open Cloud Company
positions.description: Driving sales for the world's best 'MongoDB-made-easy' platform built by ObjectRocket as well as other open source data platforms (Hadoop, MySQL, Redis) brought to you by Rackspace's Fanatical Data Services Support.

positions.title:
Title
Big Data Services Consultant
positions.description: Driving sales for the world's best 'MongoDB-made-easy' platform built by ObjectRocket as well as other open source data platforms (Hadoop, MySQL, Redis) brought to you by Rackspace's Fanatical Data Services Support.

positions.title:
Title
Manager, Business Development
positions.description:
Leading a team whose primary goal is to develop understanding and adoption of open technologies among a dedicated account base that spans across business verticals and sizes (F1K, Mid Market, SMB, Start-ups)

The technology revolution is relevant to the extent that it becomes native to the way businesses are born, developed and grown. My #1 objective is to lead a team of well versed technologists who help make the current IT revolution meaningful across industries.
By implementing a VISUAL, VIRTUAL & SOCIAL approach, my team and I are meeting the demands of this expansive education campaign.
…
see more

positions.title:
Title
Business Development Consultant
positions.description: Helping corporations discover how IT compute power can provide the limberness and agility crucial in an ever evolving business landscape.

given.text:
Alex is a true professional sales person and leader in the high tech cloud industry. Both at Rackspace and Firehost he was an overachiever in all his roles as an individual contributor and front line sales manager. Alex believes in and coaches his teams in sales process, learning and execution in goals, along with strong support of tools in CRM, Social Media and Analytics to improve win rates and customer satisfaction. Alex is a great family man with high moral character and values that he lives and works by which has great impact on his teams and company. It has been an honor to manage and work alongside Alex, he is a guy with a steady hand, sharp mind and winner instincts that I would gladly work alongside again in the future.
…
See more

In a profession that is often dominated by people who talk a big game and don't deliver Alex stands out as the gold standard and the exact opposite. He is a fearless leader – who builds tight bonds with his teams, leverages their strengths, executes, and closes the deal. Clients and colleagues are drawn to his gentle nature and relentless focus. Simply put…the guy steadily executes when other will fail.
…
See more

received.text: Wayne is one of the best leaders I have met in my professional career.  He has been a beacon for the entire business.  Despite all his responsibilities he takes time to mentor and nurture others.  A team, a business unit, an entire company is greater for having him as a leader.  Wayne is visionary, discerning and intelligent.  And he does it all with authenticity.
